inn1.comm: on target first ball, pitches on middle and leg and moves back into the right-hander, McCullum tries to work it through midwicket but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye
Vaas is swinging it back into the right-hander a fair bit, that one pitched on a good length and cramped the batsman for room, defended back to the bowler
dabbed short on the leg side for a very risky single, McCullum called for that run and was off in a flash
cuts him in half! That pitched just outside off stump and bent back into McCullum who played outside the line and was beaten
half-hearted appeal for leg before, McCullum got his front foot outside the line of off stump and got hit on the pad by one that swung back in
excellent first over from Vaas, he finishes with another that cuts back into the right-hander and cramps him for room
145 kmh but the line is a shade down leg stump, Astle pushes it slightly uppishly to midwicket for a single
the speed's up to 149kmh now, better line this time, on a good length on off stump, McCullum defends to covers
poor ball, banged short and wide outside off stump, McCullum frees his arms and lashes it over point for the first boundary of the innings, the first convincing shot of the innings really
Malinga comes back well with one that is bang on a good length on off and middle stump, defended back to the bowler
pushed to cover on the back foot
short of a length ball on off and middle stump, defended on the leg side
short of a length on off and middle stump, the ball cuts back into Astle after pitching and hits him high on the thigh pad
Attapattu makes an excellent save at cover, that was a half-volley and Astle bashed that hard at cover but didn't get past Marvan
a touch too short and a touch too wide, very uncharacteristic from Vaas, Astle waits for it and cuts through point for his first boundary
defended on the off side
excellent length, Astle is caught between going forward and playing back and gets hit on the pad
loud appeal for leg before, that shaped back into Astle and hit him on the pad in front of leg and middle, possibly slipping down leg side
good length ball that rises on McCullum on middle and leg stump, defended on the leg side

shot, sheer power from McCullum, it must be said that was a dreadful ball, short and wide, McCullum flays that over point for a flat six, that hit the boundary boards on the full and rebounded back into the field
pushed on the off side on the front foot
defended back to the bowler, good line and length on off stump
a touch shorter in length angling into the hips, defended to square leg
pitches on a good length and slants into the right hander, McCullum tries to work it off the pads but doesn't make contact, it was a good over from Malinga ... apart from that six-ball
the line is outside off stump this time and Astle frees his arms to drive, he doesn't time it well and finds point
defended on the off side, more of an unconvincing thick inside edge really
another loud lbw appeal, that was on middle and leg and the swing was taking it past leg stump, not out but Astle's problem's against inswing continue
pushed to mid-on and Astle scurries through to get to the other end, Murali was a bit slow off the blocks to cut off the single

lbw! Vaas finally gets one but it's McCullum and not Astle, who's been struggling more against the inswing. This one pitched on off stump, McCullum got his foot across and the ball hit him on the pad soon after pitching, the shape back into the right-hander ensured that it was heading for middle, umpire Steve Davis is convinced
edged but it falls short of Tillakaratne Dilshan at second slip
pushed wide of cover for a single
149kmh and nearly the yorker, superb first ball to a new batsman, Taylor does well to get his bat down in the nick of time
the bouncer follows the yorker, rather predictable I would say, Taylor ducks under it comfortably
fullish length on off and middle stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length and angling down leg side, glanced off the pads to fine leg for a single, Taylor is off the mark
more inswing from just outside off stump, Astle defends to midwicket but not out of the meat of the bat
slanting across the right-hander from over the wicket this time, Astle chops down hard on it and plays it to point
you guessed it, another inswinger to the right-hander, it pitched on off and middle and Astle gets an inside edge on to pad

dropped! Astle gives Vaas the charge and gets a massive top-edge, the ball gets a lot of height, it's swirling high up there, Atapattu is at extra cover but Chamara Silva runs across from cover and dives right in front of Atapattu and doesn't even get a hand on it, it was not Silva's catch but he went for it while Atapattu hardly made an effort, bizarre
Vaas oversteps and beats the batsman's outside edge
defended to cover on the front foot
Vaas oversteps again, one more to go
Astle is trying to break free here, he backs and away takes a step down, trying to hit through the off side but gets beaten
short outside the off stump, Astle tries to cut but misses it
short and wide outside off stump again, Astle has a poke at it and edges it wide of second slip for four to third man
better line and length, just outside off stump, Astle tries to defended on the back foot and gets beaten&
another streaky four, this time Astle edges it over the slip cordon for four more, frustrating stuff from Sri Lanka's point of view
this time it's intentional, Astle gets under one thats short and wide outside off and upper cuts it over the third-man fence, superb shot to end a very expensive over
strays down leg side, wide called
pitches on a good length on middle and leg and shaped back into the right-hander, Taylor tries to work it off his pads but gets beaten, Astle calls for a leg bye behind square on the leg side
more inswing and Astle gets beaten once again, that pitched on middle and leg, shaped back and hit the pad
a touch too full this time from Vaas, it allows Astle to get his foot forward and drive superbly down the ground for four, he's picking up steam now
a fraction short on middle and leg stump, Astle pivots, swivels and pulls down to long leg for a single
leg stump line, Taylor walks across his stumps, trying to work it down to fine leg but the ball hits the pad
he should be careful when he walks across his stumps like that, he's in danger of exposing leg stump, this time the ball clips the pad and Sangakkara dives across to collect it
a fraction short and a touch wide outside off stump, Astle uses the width to cut through point
better length, much fuller than the previous ball, and closer to off stump as well, Astle drives to mid-off
defended on the off side on the back foot
too short again and the width outside off stump allows Astle the room to cut it in front of point for four more, he's taking it to Malinga now
edged through where third slip was just was a moment ago, lucky four admittedly but Malinga isn't helping matters but bowling this wide outside off stump
defended to covers on the back foot
defended to midwicket on the front foot, that pitched on midle and leg and shaped into Taylor
slanting down leg side and Taylor moves across and more importantly, makes contact this time, he guides the ball wide off short fine leg
pushed to covers on the front foot, good-looking defense, came smack off the middle
the misfield at point allows the single, Taylor got squared up and the outside edge squeezed past Dilshan
that's Vaas's third no-ball, Astle defends to the off side
pushed to mid-on for a single, that single brings up Astle's 7000th ODI run, great effort! He's second highest for New Zealand behind Stephen Fleming who has 7338
defended to cover on the front foot
fired down leg side, very wide, poor start from Fernando
too short, Astle swivels and short-arm jabs it through midwicket for another four, the bounce is very true on this pitch
how Sri Lanka will be ruing that dropped catch! Astle gives Fernando the charge and biffs it back past him for yet another four, he moves on to 47
wide outside off stump, Astle lets that go
full ball on leg stump, Astle should have cashed in but he missed the flick and got hit on the pad
poor ball, short of a length and down leg stump, Taylor dabs it fine of Vaas at short fine leg and the batsmen run three before Vaas pulls it back just inside the boundary
pulled to mid-on, Dilhara starts poorly, 13 runs off the over
tight line and length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
shot, the shot of the day perhaps, a touch too full and Taylor leant forward and timed the drive perfectly past mid-off, that raced away to the fence
defended on the leg side
full and wide from Vaas, Taylor gives it a thump and the ball bounces hard into the ground and over cover on its way to the fence

poor line, on leg stump, Taylor moves across and tickles it between the keeper and short fine leg for four more, I had said that Vaas was economical so far at the start of the over and he promptly concedes 12
swept to deep square leg for a single
tossed up outside off stump, Taylor tries to defend on the front foot but gets hit on the pad
defended to midwicket on the back foot
Taylor tries to sweep from outside off stump, he's in no position to play that shot and the ball hits the pad
too short from Murali, Taylor makes use of the room outside off stump and cuts to the point fence
defended to midwicket on the front foot
fullish on middle and off, strives for the yorker, Astle digs it out in front of mid-on for a quick single
full and moving down leg stump, easy pickings for Taylor who flicks to square leg for one more
fifty for Astle, flicks a full ball on leg stump to deep square leg, it's been an excellent innings after a very scratchy start against Vaas
defended to cover on the front foot
outstanding shot, simply superb, Taylor walks across his stumps and flicks, he used his wrists to work it wide of the fielder in the deep and got enough elevation to send it over the fence
driven to deep point for two more, that's New Zealand's 100
tossed up on off stump, Astle goes down on one knee and sweeps
whoops, Taylor tries to read Murali off the pitch and doesn't do a very good job, the big offspinner beats him and the ball hits his pad and glove before dropping safely
defended to point
defended to midwicket on the front foot
swept down to deep square leg for a single
Astle brings out the sweep again and does it well, another single to deep square leg
defended to midwicket
flighted delivery on off stump, Astle shuffles across and defends to cover
pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
defended to Jayasuriya off the back foot
worked off the pads through square leg for a single
defended on the front foot, Jayasuriya absolutely zipped through that over,  think it was under a minute and a half
cheeky cheeky, tossed up on off stump, anglign across the right hander, Astle tries to reverse sweep but hits it into the ground to short third man
fuller ball on middle and leg, swept for a single
Taylor opens up his stance to face Murali from round teh wicket adn defends on the frotn foot
worked off the pads for a single
defended on the front foot on the leg side
played back to Murali on the front foot
fullish ball on middle nad leg, the batsman gets forward and drives to long on for a single
defended on the leg side, Jayasuriya is firing it into leg stump
swept to deep square leg for a single
full on leg stump, pushed to long-on for one
pitches outside leg stunp and hits Astle on the pads
pitches on off stump and Astle opts to sweep, collects a single to deep square leg
tossed up outside off stump, drifting across the right-hander, driven to cover
tossed up but the line is outside leg, Taylor moves across and sweeps past short fine leg
dabbed to short line leg for a quick single, Murali is sticking to a leg stump line
the doosra and Astle was beaten going for the cover drive
full toss on leg stump, swept down to long leg for two more
defended on the front foot, six runs off that over, New Zealand are ticking along nicely, this partnership is now 99
full ball on off and middle stump, driven past Jayasuriya and that's the 100-run partnership between these two, excellent effort
a touch shorter on middle and leg, swept to short fine leg
pushed down the ground fro a single to long-off
full and fired into leg stump, Taylor moves across and gets hit on the pad
change of pace, this was much slower, pushed to long-off for one
leg-stump line, swept past short fine leg for one more to end the over
much quicker through the air, pitches outside off stump and spins back into Astle and hits him on the pad
the doosra but very wide outside off stump
fuller ball on middle and leg, swept to deep backward square for one more
tossed up, pitches outside off stump and spins into Taylor who gets forward to defend but gets hit on the pad, Murali appeals but the batsman was far too forward
defended to point on the front foot
flighted delivery on middle and leg , Taylor comes forward pushes to midwicket
defended to midwicket on the front foot
flat trajectory on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
fullish length on leg stump, swept to deep square leg
lovely use of the feet, Taylor gets into position quickly and flicks in front of square for four, that's the first boundary off the spinners
fifty for Taylor and he reaches it with a delightful straight drive to the long-off fence, 50 off 52 balls, fantastic innings
defended back to the bowler
pushed to mid-on off the front foot
the doosra, pitches on off stump and turns away, Astle didn't pick it but opened the face at the last minute, the edge ran wide of Sangakkara for three to third man
defended on the front foot on the off side
full ball on leg stump, Taylor tries to sweep but doesn't connect well
whack! tossed up on off stump, Taylor gets his front foot forward and lofts over mid-on, it's a Powerplay so there's on one in the deep, intelligent shot
defended on the front foot to point
the yorker first up, fired at leg stump, Astle backs away and gets beaten
full length on off stump, Astle drives past cover for one
good length ball on off stump, 150kmh, Taylor waits on the back foot and defends to midwicket
shot, the perfect flick shot and timed to perfection as well, it was full on middle and leg, Taylor walked across and flicked in front of square leg for four
the low full toss and Taylor flicks in front of midwicket for four more, he's in sublime touch, timing it superbly now
defended on the of side, Malinga finishes another poor over, bowling far too full
flighted delivery on leg stump, Astle comes on the frontfoot and sweeps it to fine leg
big one! Tossed up outside off stump, Astle plants the front foot forward and just swings that high and handsome over long-on for maximum! Woo hoo!
too far down leg stump
flighted delivery outside off stump, Astle comes on the frontfoot and blocks it
flighted delivery outside off stump again, this time Astle sweeps it to fine leg
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Astle comes on the frontfoot and sweeps it to fine leg
tossed up on off stump, Astle comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
fullish outside off stump, easily driven into the covers for one
strays to leg stump, Astle works it off the pads through square leg for one
good ball, pitches on a sweet length outside off stump and seams away just enough to beat Taylor's backfoot prod
bouncer! Full and furious on off stump, forcing Taylor - who's not a small man - down onto his haunches
fuller this time, Taylor gets half-forward and has to check his shot to keep it down along the ground to Malinga
another good delivery, very fast and seaming off a good length outside off stump, Taylor is caught no where, really, trying to run it down to third man, and ends up making no contact
quick and flat on off stump, Astle goes back and taps back down the ground, Dilshan tries his soccer skills but Taylor gets in his way, the ball escapes and the batsmen cross for one
short of length delivery outside off, Taylor shuffles across and plays it to deep mid-wicket
flattish delivery on the middle leg, Astle shuffles across and defends it
short and wide, Astle likes 'em there, and he cracks that  just wide of point for an easy run
flighted delivery on leg stump and Taylor comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-on
full and flat on off stump, defended back to Dilshan
flat on leg stump, easily worked around the corner for one, and that the 150 partnership between rookie and veteran
gives it more air on off stump, Astle defends back to him
tossed up outside off stump, driven to mid-off for one

oh boy, he's gone! Tossed up outside off stump, Taylor comes forward and drives back down the ground, the ball ricochets off Jayasuriya's fingers onto the stumps and Astle, who's backed away some distance, is caught short by about six inches, and his great innings comes to an end
flighted outside off stump, defended stoically
flatter on leg stump, easily flicked around the corner for one
flat outside off stump, comes forward and works it to mid-wicket
flattish delivery on the stumps, Taylor shuffles across and pushes it to mid-wicket
flatter on leg stump, worked to square leg with ease
tossed up on off stump, Fulton plays across the line to the on side
tossed up again, Fulton gets forward and defends
gives it some air on middle and off, and Fulton drives to long-on to open his account
flat outside off stump, Fulton goes back and drives past point for one, thinks about the second but resists, wisely
flighted on leg stump, easily driven past mid-on for one more
flat on middle and leg, driven to mid-on
flatter on leg stump, played very fine, Fulton calls for two early and they get it easily, well run
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and flicks to mid-wicket
flat outside off stump, Taylor gets forward and checks the drive back to Jayasuriya
tossed up on middle and off, easily worked wide of mid-on for one, Silva has a shy and hits the stumps, but he's home
flat on off stump, he comes forward and plays over it
flat outside off stump, driven down to long-off for one
flat on leg stump, he shuffles but cant time the flick well enough
shorter and flatter on leg stump, he goes back and punches to mid-on
short and flat on leg stump this time, and its eased past mid-wicket for one more
tossed up on off stump, worked to mid-on
nice and straight, and its driven down to long-on for one
flighted well outside leg stump, and he sweeps hard down to Fernando at deep backward square leg
flattish delivery on the stumps, Fulton comes on the frontfoot and drives it to mid-on
flat on off stump, he goes back and drives down the ground, Jayasuriya dives across and fields it
shorter outside off stump, Fulton shuffles across and drives it to long-off
flat on middle and leg, worked out to Murali at a wide long-on
more air this time on off stump, he comes forward and drives to long-on
short outside off stump, Fulton goes back and punches well down to long-off
flat on middle and off, Taylor flicks it into the vacant mid-wicket for one more
flat outside off stump, easy pickings for Fulton who drives down to long-off for one more
flattish delivery outside off, Taylor shuffles across and is rapped on the pads going for the sweep, Dilshan appeals but the umpire says nope, pitched outside the line
short of length outside off stump, Fulton goes on the backfoot and cuts it square of the wicket for two
flattish delivery on leg, Fulton shuffles across and drives it to mid-wicket
flighted outside off stump, Fulton comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-off
short outside off stump, Taylor shuffles across and plays that to gully
tossed up on leg stump, he comes on the frontfoot and defends
short outside off, Taylor goes on the backfoot and plays that to gully, straight to the fielder
tossed up Taylor comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long off
hello!! Taylor says nuff's this, see the tossed up ball on middle and leg, and has a step forward and swings it superbly over a wide long-on for six, huge shot that
flighted delivery on leg, Fulton comes on the frontfoot and drives it to mid-wicket
tossed up outside off, Fulton comes on the frontfoot and chips it to long-on
flat this time, Fulton goes on the backfoot and drives it to extra-cover
Taylor! Tossed up outside off stump, and he has another free swing of the arms, picking it from smack where it landed and sailing it high over deep square leg for his second biggie of the over!
tossed up outside off stump, Fulton defends with bat and pad married
a fraction shorter, punched into the covers
flat outside off stump, Fulton drives back to Murali
bad ball, full and flighted outside leg stump, Fulton picks up the length well and gets a good stride forward, sweeping in the gap around the corner and picking up four
flattish delivery outside off, Fulton goes on the backfoot and defends it
flat and shorter on leg stump, he goes back and works it off the hips for one
short on off stump, he backs away and punches into the covers for one
flat on middle and leg, Taylor comes forward and defends to the on side
speared in fast outside leg stump, Taylor doesnt offer a shot and the ball clips his boot and escapes for runs, but the umpire signals a dead ball
tossed up on leg, well clipped around the corner for two, he's into the 90s now
tossed up, Taylor drives down to long-off and thats the 50 stand
tossed up on leg stump, Taylor comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-on
short outside off stump, well read and he slaps it past point for one

gone! Quicker delivery outside off stump, pitches a fraction shorter and spins the other way, Fulton gets into position to cut quickly but doesnt time it well, and Sangakkara does very well to snaffle the thin underedge, Murali strikes
tossed up outside off stump, Vettori comes forward and chips it to mid-on for one
tossed up again, Taylor comes forward and nicely works it into mid-wicket for one
good one, sir! Tossed up and it fizzes past Vettori's half-forward prod
length ball on the stumps, Vettori sweeps it through square leg for one

tossed up outside off, it pitches and spins in as Vettori lunges forward, Sangakkara collects it slightly wide of the stumps and whips off the bails, the appeal goes upstairs and its ruled in Vettori's favour, his back foot was just inside the line
flat on leg stump, driven to long-on for one
slower, looping delivery on the stumps, Taylor defends back to Jayasuriya
flatter on middle and leg, Taylor comes forward and flicks out to long-on
flatter outside off stump, Vettori cheekily tries to run it to third man but there's no turn on the ball and he's beaten
flatter outside off stump, Vettori plants the foot down the pitch and swats the ball through mid-wicket for one to the sweeper out in the deep
flat on the stumps, swept into the mid-wicket region again
flat outside off stump, Taylor defends to cover
well flighted outside off stump, Taylor tries to sweep but misses, rapped on the pads outside the line
tossed up on off stump, a nervous-looking Taylor defends
tossed up again, and he defends
tossed up on off stump, and Taylor comes forward and defends, well bowled, and well played
short of a length outside off stump and rising, Vettori stands and flirts with it, looking for the dab to third man, was old man Dan
full outside off stump, almost a yorker, Vettori looks to flick it through leg but cant beat the man there at mid-wicket
Vaas doesnt waste time in striking! Fullish ball outside off stump, a tad slower too, and all Vettori can do is chip it in the air to Jayawardene at cover

and he lasts one delivery, would you believe it?!? Fullish delivery on middle and leg, the Vaas special, Marshall shuffles and falls over as he plays across the pads, he's rapped in front, the Sri Lankans ask the question and umpire Davis shoots up the dreaded finger
no hat-trick for Vaas, as Marshall goes back to a back of a length delivery and pushes to mid-off to get off the mark first-ball
oh the tension! Fullish delivery just outside leg stump, Taylor shuffles across and is rapped on the pads, a strong appeal by Vaas but the umpire shakes his head, that was close!
quick, good length ball outside off stump, Marshall hops and defends
short and getting some lift too, but Marshall goes up on the toes and uppercuts it through gully for one down to third man
good length outside off stump, Taylor gets on top of it and squeezes it through point with soft hands, and gets a quick single to move to 98
fullish on off stump, striving for the yorker was Fernando, and Marshall digs it out back to him in his follow-through
good length outside off stump, Marshall plays well with soft hands, and places it in front of point for a sharp single
banged in short on the stumps, Taylor goes for the pull but mistimes it, hitting into the ground in front of square leg, he was cramped for room basically, and the hundred has to wait a little longer
good length outside off stump, Marshall is cramped for room and can only defend to backward point off the backfoot
a low full toss on leg stump, Marshall clips it past square leg for one
fullish length outside off stump, Taylor pushes into the covers, no chance of a run
fullish on off stump, Taylor flicks to Jayawardene at mid-wicket and chances his arm, and he makes it, thats 99 for him
a yorker in the blockhole, well dug out but thats a dot ball
full in the zone again, but this time Marshall flicks it square of the pitch for one to retain the strike, and gets a warning for running down the middle as well
full outside off stump, Marshall cracks that into the covers for one

there's the hundred, and Napier explodes! The field had closed in for Taylor, the crowd was on its feet in anticipation, cheering, clapping, and Malinga served up a good length delivery outside off stump, and Taylor just tapped that in between cover and point and set off, well played, 100 in just his third ODI!
full outside off stump, driven out to long-off for a brace&
banged in short outside off stump, Marshall backs away and went for the uppercut, almost as if he were giving catching practice, and he times it just over an outstretched Sangakkar for four, cheeky
fuller length delivery outside off, Marshall comes on the frontfoot and defends it solidly
a full toss outside leg stump, Marshall didnt see it all, backed well outside the line and copped it on the upper thigh, the ball rolls in front of point
short of a length outside off stump, Marshall sets off down the track, and gets into good position to slap the square-drive over point, on the go, for four
a half-volley outside off stump, Marshall dances down again and chips it over covers for one
smacked! A good length outside off stump, and Taylor just swings it across the line, very, very cleanly, and bangs it superbly over deep mid-wicket for six
good length outside off stump, Taylor goes back and punches it over mid-off for one

gone! Fullish this time on the stumps, Marshall gets under it and attempts the lofted straight drive, but the ball's slower and he's way too soon into the shot, the ball pops up in the air for some time and Sangakkara takes a simple catch behind the stumps
banged in, Taylor swings across the line, gets the edge, but it doesnt carry to Sangakkara
fullish outside off stump, Franklin drops the hands and squeezes one down to third man
he oversteps, its a low full toss outside off stump which Taylor slaps to Atapattu at cover
low full toss outside leg stump, Taylor swings it to mid-on and scampers through for one
yorker outside off stump, Franklin runs it down to third man for a single
strives for the yorker, gets it wrong as its too full outside leg stump, and Taylor flicks with the inside edge down to fine leg
but that one's smack on target! Fires in the reverse-swinging yorker on off stump, Franklin doesnt pick and plays at the wrong line, and has his stumps rearranged! Express delivery from Malinga
fullish outside off stump, Adams backs away and cant time the slash at all
full outside off stump, Taylor struggles to reach out and get bat to it, ends up splicing the toe of the bat, and falls over in the process
good shot! Vaas overpitches outside off stump, and Taylor gets underneath it, slamming it well over mid-on, one bounce and over the ropes
full outside off stump again, Taylor comes down the pitch and drives, but gets an inside edge to cover
half-volley on middle and leg, worked to mid-wicket for one
he tries the yorker, and somehow Taylor gets under it and flicks square for four, he opened up the front leg to get leverage, and pulled if off brilliantly, its his day

yes, it really is Taylor's day! Full and fast outside off stump, he flashes the expansive drive, exposing the stumps, and ends up with a thick outside edge that flies past Sangakkara's dive and runs away for four
full outside off stump, Adams backs away and slaps it through point, the sweeper cuts it off in good time
good stuff from Malinga, the yorker on leg stump, Taylor gets an inside edge down to fine leg
doesnt get the yorker right this time, its a low full toss on leg stump but Adams has backed away too much and gets cramped, driving into the ground, it bounces over Malinga for one down to long-off
fuller length delivery on leg stump, Taylor comes on the frontfoot and drags it to mid-wicket

bowled! Fullish on off stump, again Adams backs away and exposes the stumps, looking to open up on the off side, but the pace is too good for him, he misses, and his off stump goes for a walk! Typical you-miss-I-hit dismissal, which Malinga is all too eager to remind Adams

close! Malinga, expectedly, fires it in full and furious, its not a yorker, rather a low full toss, and Gillespie just stands there and lets it hit him on the pad, theres a huge appeal from everyone in blue, but the umpire shakes his head, yes that actually was pitched outside leg stump!
superb delivery, spot on in the blockhole, Taylor stands and digs it out
full outside off stump, a cramping Taylor drops his hands on it and runs it down to  third man
good length on leg stump, Gillespie has backed away well outside the line and ends up running it past gully for one more
banged in shorter on middle and leg, Taylor steps away and tries to pull, cant time it at all and gets an edge off the bat onto the bat, and as he spins around he gets cramped up, and hits the deck
fuller this time on middle and leg, Taylor does very well to free the arms and hammer it down to long-on, and hobbles back for the second

a half-volley outside off stump, Taylor drives through the covers and struggles down the pitch for the single, and remains unbeaten on 128 as New Zealand finish on 285 for 8, great effort from the rookie in just his third game

inn2.comm: fullish ball first up, on off stump, Tharanga gets forward and defends on the off side
pitches outside off stump and holds its line, Tharanga lets it go
pitches wide outside off stump and moves away from the left-hander, left alone to McCullum
full ball on the pads, worked down to fine leg for a single, Sri Lanka are away
Franklin oversteps, he's bowling from the same end that Vaas bowled from and he also had a problem with no-balls early on, Jayasuriya dabs that on the off side to get off the mark
short of a length ball on the hips, defended on the leg side
pushed back to the bowler on the back foot
full ball on leg stump, whipped through square leg for a single
beaten outside the off stump, pitches on middle and slants across the left hander who pushes forward but misses the ball
edged wide of the slip cordon for a single to third man
short-pitched ball and Jayasuriya gets into pulling-position in a flash and helps himself to a four to the midwicket fence
short again, this time Jayasuriya tries to pull behind square but doesn't make proper contact, he gets a single to short fine leg
full length this time but the line is down leg side, wide called
good length and line to finish the over, this was much straighter and Tharanga played it back to the bowler
poor ball, full and on leg stump, Jayasuriya gets a tickle and the ball races to the fine leg fence
better length and line, on off and middle, Jayasuriya gets hit on the pad
pitches wide outside off and angles into the left-hander, left alone to the keeper
left alone again to McCullum
on the shorter side and the line drifts on to leg stump, Jayasuriya doesn't time the pull well and gets a single to square leg
defended to square leg on the back foot
superb ball, pitches on a good length on middle stump and angles away from Jayasuriya who plays forward, the ball whizzes past the outside edge
defended on the front foot on the off side, Mason is bowling a tight length
massive massive hit, Mason bowls a half-volley on leg stump and Jayasuriya gets under it and sends it on to the roof of the Harris stand, what a blow
fuller length on middle and off stump, he was aiming for the blockhole and nearly found it, Jayasuriya digs it out
good length ball on middle and off stump, Jayasuriya gets half forward and defends
excellent ball to finish, Jayasuriya pokes at one that pitches on off stump and moves away, he gets beaten
pitches on a good length just outside off stump, Tharanga goes fishing outside off stump and gets beaten by the bounce, luckily for him, he didn't even get a  nibble
pushed through covers for two, he didn't time that well but he found the gap
wide outside off stump and Tharanga plays away from his body and gets an edge down to third man, this is Franklin's second no-ball
dabbed short on the leg side for a speedy single
pushed wide of the fielder at cover for another quick run
pitches on a good length, just outside off stump and angling into the left-hander, Tharanga leans forward and drives between cover and mid-off, Vettori gives chase and the batsmen run two
defended on the front foot to midwicket
good length ball on middle and off stump, Jayasuriya tries to heave it on the leg side and gets an inside edge that almost shaved leg stump, lucky break for him
pitches on off stump and angles away from Tharanga who wafts at it because it's a little short but misses it
lovely shot, short of a length ball outside off stump, Tharanga picks the length up early, gets forward and lofts through the line to the long-off fence
cut hard to point for a quick single
you just cannot bowl full on leg stump to Sanath Jayasuriya, unless you want to be picked up and deposited to the midwicket boundary, Mason will do well to learn from his mistakes
edged between slip and gully for four, Tharanga is riding his luck by prodding away from his body at balls that are short of a length
pushed towards midwicket for a sharp single, the running between the wickets has been very alert
defended to cover on the front foot
short ball on middle and leg stump, Jayasuriya pulls to deep square leg, Vettori has a man in the deep
full ball and far too wide, Tharanga gets forward and lashes it through cover point for four, that brings up Sri Lanka's fifty in just the seventh over
bouncer, Tharanga ducks under it
fullish length, pitching on off stump and moving away, left alone by Jayasuriya&
short of a length, slanting across Jayasuriya's off stump, punched off the back foot through cover
pitching outside leg stump and angling into Jayasuriya's pad, the ball hit the glove first and then hit thigh, the umpire says leg bye
dabbed to point for a cheeky but extremely well run single
short of a length ball on middle and off stump, Jayasuriya hits through the line and lofts over mid-on, he didn't time it well enough to reach the fence
fullish on leg and middle stump, Mason hasn't learnt from the last over, Jayasuriya picks it and sends it into the stands at midwicket, Sri Lanka are racing away
poor start, full on leg stump, flicked easily to the square leg fence
poor start continues, a no ball this time, dabbed short on the leg side for one
another no ball, and if it wasn't called it would ahve been wide for sure, very wide down leg side, Gillespie is having starting problems
driven to mid-off on the front foot
he's getting his radar right now, tat pitching on a good length on middle and off, defended on the off side
spoke to soon, the radar's broken again, drifts down leg side once more, wide called
short of a length ball on off stump, Jayasuriya stands tall and defends on the back foot
short ball directed down leg side, Jayasuriya swats it behind square for four
poor bowling, full on leg stump and Jayasuriya flicks it off his pads to the fine leg fence, can't bowl there when your fine leg is in the circle, Gillespie concedes 16 off his first over in ODIs
pulled through midwicket for a single
wide wide wide down leg side, short fine leg had a better chance of saving that than Sangakkara, ok I'm exaggerating, five wides
Jayasuriya tries to pull but gets an inside egde to the leg side
short of length delivery outside off, Tharanga plays back cuts it to third man
Jayasuriya plays back and tries to pull it, inside edges it very fine
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot
turned behind square on the leg side for one
excellent ball, beats the outside edge by a fraction but it's a no-ball
pushed to midwicket for a single
short of a length ball on leg stump, it hits the pad and rolls behind square on the leg side
another wide ball down leg side, Gillespie is looking ragged
pushed to mid-off on the front foot
short of a length ball on leg stump, tucked off the hips to deep square leg
another no-ball,  put it down to nerves but it's atrocious stuff, pushed on the front foot back past the bowler
tosses up a half-volley on off stump, Jayasuriya creams it through cover, Vettori has a sweeper on the fence but it's timed too well for him to save it
wide outside off stump, Tharanga tries to flay it through the off side but gets a thich edge past McCullum for four more
pushed to the vacant square leg region for a single
bang! full outside off stump and Jayasuriya hammers it over cover, he'll hit the ball out of shape at this rate
Adams pulls a peach of a ball out of no where, that pitched on a length, bounced and zipped past Jayasuriya's forward defense
tries to cut but doesn't make proper contact
wide outside off stump, Jayasuriya chases it but doesn't make contact
defended on the off side
good length ball angling into the left-hander, pushed to mid-on
short of a length this time, angling down leg side, tucked off the hips for a single
he's doing better from round the wicket, not giving the batsman room by angling the ball into the left-hander, defended on the off side
a touch shorter and wider outside off stump, Jayasuriya cuts to point
a bouncer to finish the over, Jayasuriya ducks
pitches wide outside off stump and it's too short, Tharanga cuts to the firlder on the fence at cover point
mid-off is in the circle and Jayasuriya goes over him, he hit that through the line and timed it superbly
edged but it's too high for McCullum to take the catch, four more and New Zealand are bleeding
cut off the back foot to point
brutal, short and wide outside of stump and Jayasuriya smashes that to the cover fence

it's high, high but has it got the distance? It has! Jayasuriya lofted that miles in the air over mid-on and the ball just cleared the fence. If this was a boxing match the officials would have stopped it because New Zealand just can't defend themselves.
leg bye taken to midwicket
another no-ball, Gillespie's problems continue, he's having a shocking debut so far
slants down leg side and Tharanga glances that off his pads to the fine leg fence
better ball, pitching outside off and angling into off and middle, defended towards cover
that took Tharanga by surprise as it rose sharply off a good length and hit him on the arm, the batsmen run a leg bye behind square on the off side
angling into the pads again, worked behind square on the leg side
full toss on off stump, Tharanga pushes it to mid-off and seeing that the fielder is on the edge of the circle, scampers through for a single
pitches wide outside off stump and goes straight through, Tharanga tries to cut but misses, wide called

Tharanga tries to cut again but misses once more, it was wide outside off but closer than the previous ball, McCullum had whipped off the bails and the third umpire was called to decide whether Tharanga was safe, he was
pitches outside of stump and holds its line, Tharanga pushes forward, playing for turn, but misses
again Tharanga tries to cut but doesn't make contact
dabbed in front of point for a single
width offered to Jayasuriya and he cuts past short third man, Marshall (whether it's James or Hamish I don't know) chases after it and keeps the batsmen to two
dabbed to short third man for a single to end the over, five off Vettori's first
pitches on a good length outside off stump and slants into the left-hander, left alone to the wicketkeeper
just short of a length angling into off stump, Jayasuriya cuts past point for a single
fuller length on off and middle stump, Tharanga gets half forward and pushes to one of the Marshalls at cover
defended on the back foot to point

full ball on middle stump, Tharanga drives to Vettori at mid-off and sets off for a single, Jayasuriya his having none of it and Tharanga is a long way down, the throw from Vettori is poor and Tharanga lives to face another ball
defended on the back foot to the leg side
huge appeal for caught behind, no one is convinced apart from McCullum and Vettori, Jayasuriya tried to sweep from outside off but misses, the ball went under the bottom edge
this time he connects with the sweep and collects the single
Tharanga sweeps this time and gets a single to deep square leg
wide outside off stump, left alone by Jayasuriya who looks at the umpire searching for the wide call
defended on the off side
pushed to cover point on the back foot
full ball on off and middle stump, driven to Marshall at cover
banged in short and Tharanga ducks under the bouncer, Gillespie has been far better since he switched to round the wicket, by better i mean relative to his performance from over the wicket
he oversteps and fires it at leg stump, Tharanga doesn't make contact and gets hit on the thigh
pushed to midwicket for a quick single
the slower ball ends up as a beamer, it's above wait height and the umpire calls no-ball
where did that come from?? that rose from a good length and hurried Jayasuriya, he tried to get out of the way but the ball clipped the edge and ran down to third man
Gillespie bowls a bouncer and Jayasuriya takes evasive action
defended on the front foot, Gillespie ends with a good length ball on off and middle stump
tossed up on off stump, Tharanga drives but can't beat the fielder at cover
a touch shrorter in length, tharanga waits on the back foot and punches between cover and point to bring up his fifty, well played
defended on the front foot back to Vettori
pushed to cover for a quick single
full ball on off stump, Tharanga sweeps to deep square leg for a single
short ball and wide outside off as well, Jayasuriya cuts behind point, Taylor picks it up just inside the fence
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Tharanga just goes back and whacks it to the sweeper cover for four, welcome James, he says!
good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga comes on the frontfoot and drives it to cover
good length the off stump, Tharanga comes on the frontfoot and pushes it to cover point
hammered! A fuller length delivery on the stumps, and he waltzes down the track and smashes it to long on, powerful shot
good length delivery outside off stump, Tharanga goes on the backfoot and runs it down to third man
full outside off stump, Jayasuriya comes on the frontfoot and looks to loft it, but misses the line
short and wide, Tharanga has nothing to do but flash that imperiously through point for four, shot
better ball, lands on a sweet length outside off stump and sucks him into a tame back-foot prod, the ball beats the outer edge
fullish, Tharanga gives him the charge and swings across the line, mistiming it but still picking up one down to long-on, he's just toying now
short and wide, swinging away, Jayasuriya has a pull at it but cant make contact
hurray for Jayasuriya! Banged in short, and at that pace its useless, and Jayasuriya swings into his pull shot and sends it sailing miles over backward square leg, incredible!
fuller length delivery outside off, Jayasuriya comes on the frontfoot and drives it to mid-off
good length ball outside off stump swing in and cramps Jayasuriya, but he plays it softly and picks up one anyways, dropping the ball at his feet
good length outside off stump, Tharanga runs it down to third man for a single
good length, cramping him for room, and he pushes to point
another good length ball outside off stump, forces Jayasuriya half-forward and he runs it to point
a tad shorter outside off stump, and Jayasuriya pulls unconvincingly to James Marshall at midwicket, but picks up one
hoo hah! Fullish outside off stump, and Tharanga comes forward and bludgeons it over extra cover for four, and he's pushing Jayasuriya for his money now

hah! This is Jayasuriya we're talking about! What you can do, Tharanga, I can do better! Dropped in ever so short but he's onto it in a flash, pulling it high over deep backward square leg for six, and thats an incredible hundred for the master blaster! 78 balls! What a guy!
murder! Short of a length delivery outside off, and what does he do? He goes on the backfoot and cuts it to square third man
carnage! Fuller length delivery outside off, Jayasuriya comes on the frontfoot and lofts it to mid-wicket for four more, there's no stopping the Motera Marauder
short of length delivery on the leg, Jayasuriya goes on the backfoot and pulls it to deep mid-wicket
good length delivery outside off, Tharanga shuffles across and misses the line
good length delivery outside off, Tharanga shuffles across and cuts it to point, straight to the fielder

his reign comes to an end! A good length outside off stump, up on his toes he goes, and uppercuts it over backward point and finds the fielder on the ropes, who takes a few steps in and pouches the catch

oh ho, another wicket! That was a good, quick delivery, tight outside off stump, and Tharanga just stands there and plays at it, getting an outside edge that a gleeful McCullum accepts, thats two in two balls
fullish outside off stump, and Sangakkara just stands and watches it through, so no hat-trick
straighter this time, and Sangakkara's underway with a neat flick around the corner for one
a great ball, seaming and lifting from outside off stump, forcing Jayawardene up on his toes and withdrawing the bat
a tad fuller, and Jayawardene drops the soft hands on it, running it to point
straight on the pads, Sangakkara works that easily into the vacant mid-wicket region for a couple
good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara goes on the backfoot and pushes it to extra cover
he moves over the wicket, and lands it on a good length on off stump, Sangakkara goes back and across and defends
not really overpitched at all, but Sangakkara checks his shot and just pushes it with finesse past mid-on for four, a shot for the purists
better length this time on off stump, and he defends back to the bowler
good length angling across him, Sangakkara drops the soft hands on it and calls for one as the ball rolls into the covers
short and wide, asking for trouble, no great flourish from Sangakkara but he just cuts that perfectly in the gap at point for four
yorker length delivery outside off, Sangakkara shuffles across and defends it solidly
quicker ball nips in from outside off stump and forces him back, but he's saved by the inside edge
good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara shuffles across and pushes it to cover
fuller outside off stump, and he shoulders arms
banged in short outside leg stump, and in a flash Sangakkara moves into position to hook, doesnt time it all that well, but gets enough bat on it to pick up another boundary to fine leg
good length outside off stump, Jayawardene stands and defends back to Gillespie
another well-directed delivery outside off stump, worked up to 143ks, and Jayawardene defends to cover&
a little looser this time outside off stump, and Jayawardene frees the arms, cutting past gully for one out to the sweeper
bad ball, bounced well outside leg stump and evades Sangakkara as well, and fine leg has some work to do cutting it off
good length delivery on the stumps, Sangakkara goes on the backfoot shows the full face of the bat and defends it solidly
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Sangakkara comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off stump, Sangakkara goes back and punches to cover
edged and taken! No, its a no-ball! Oh man, a full, swinging delivery outside edge and Jayawardene pokes at it, getting a genuine outside edge that first slip holds, but the bowler's overstepped!
good length delivery outside off, angling away from the right hander, Jayawardene shuffles across and misses the line
good length delivery on the stumps, Jayawardene goes on the backfoot and defends
too full down the leg side, and he clips it fine for four, good shot
a fraction shorter outside off stump, and away for four it goes as Jayawardene stands and slaps it over point, another fine shot
better, a good length on the stumps, and Jayawardene stands and defends
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene comes on the frontfoot opens the face of the bat, running it to point
good length delivery outside off stump, Jayawardene goes on the backfoot and defends
good length outside off stump, Sangakarra stands and pushes in front of point for one
fullish outside off stump, Jayawardene gets on top of it and defends to point
full and wide, Jayawardene thumps a drive but gets a thick outside edge that screams throught a vacant gully for four, a lot of bottom hand in that shot
now thats a shot! Short and wide and he dispatches it disdainfully over point, one bounce and four
better length this time from Gillespie, forcing Jayawardene to shuffle across and defend down into the off side
another good length delivery outside off stump, Jayawardene goes back and defends stylishly
fuller outside off stump, Sangakkara comes forward and defends into the covers
full again and this time he drives into the covers, but cant beat James Marshall there
straighter this time, Sangakkara rolls the wrists and picks up a quick single into mid-wicket
too short on off stump and Jayawardene pulls it away through square leg, thats the short boundary and he picks up four more
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene comes on the frontfoot and runs it down to third man
a fraction shorter outside off stump and he pulls through square leg for one out to the sweeper
flat outside off stump, swept away through square for one
tossed up on leg stump, spins down the pads as Jayawardene misses the attempted paddle
flattish delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene comes on the frontfoot and drives it to cover point
short of length delivery outside off, Sangakkara comes on the frontfoot and cuts it to point
flighted delivery on the stumps, Jayawardene comes on the frontfoot and defends
catch it! Where are the fielders? Tossed up, and Jayawardene comes forward and lofts it to deep mid-wicket, but the ball lands in no mans land
good length delivery on the stumps, Sangakkara goes back and pushes to mid-off
good length delivery outside off, Sangakkara goes on the backfoot and cuts it to deep backward point
fullish on leg, Jayawardene comes on the frontfoot and drives it to mid-wicket
short of length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara goes on the backfoot and cuts it to point
good length delivery outside off, angling into the left hander, Sangakkara goes back and defends
short of a length delivery outside the off stump, and Sangakkara goes on the backfoot and whacks it to the cover fence
tossed up outside off stump, defended to covers and Vettori fields himself
tossed up again, and Jayawardene defends once more
flat outside off stump, he sweeps hard through square leg for one
a tad shorter outside off stump, Sangakkara cuts it through point for a couple
looped up outside off stump, this time he sweeps well around the corner for a couple more
quicker outside off stump, he again tries to paddle-sweep it but doesnt make contact, Vettori lets out a tame appeal
good length outside off stump, Jayawardene stands and pushes to point, and 'WAIT' is the call back to Sangakkara
good length outside off stump, he stands and opens the face of the bat and picks up one past gully
back of a good length outside off stump, Sangakkara goes back and punches to extra cover
quicker ball on the stumps, gets some purchase off the pitch and surprises Sangakkara, who gets the bottom hand off the bat in time and plays it down
slower, rolled the fingers over it, full outside off stump and Sangakkara pushes to cover
shorter this time and he cuts through gully for one, much better over that from Adams
flat outside off stump, Sangakkara comes down and chips it just wide of mid-off for one
tossed up on leg stump, Jayawardene advances and flicks to mid-on
flattish delivery on the stumps, Sangakkara shuffles across and defends it
tossed up, Sangakkara comes down the track and drives it to extra cover, straight to the fielder
too short and flat, and Sangakkara pulls it superbly through square leg for four

tame dismissal! Tossed up, tantalizingly, rolling the fingers over the seam, getting the ball to stop in the air, and Sangakkara gets a step down the track, looking to flick it away, but chips it back to Vettori
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Jayawardene comes forward and defends
good length delivery outside off, Jayawardene shuffles across and cuts it to point
good length delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene comes on the frontfoot and pushes it to short cover
short of a length delivery on leg stump, Atapattu goes on the backfoot and turns it to square leg
good length delivery on the stumps, Jayawardene comes forward and defends
back of a good length outside off stump, this time he goes back and punches to cover
tossed up outside off stump, Atapattu plays in front his front pad and misses it, appeals, but the umpire says nope, too much drift outside the stumps
flat on off stump, defended back to Vettori
flatter trajectory on off stump, Atapattu goes back and defends to Vettori
short outside off stump, he cuts but cant beat gully
he drops short again, and this time Atapattu doesnt miss out, slapping a firm cut shot through point for four
good length on the stumps, he goes back and defends
fuller outside off stump, Atapattu tries to run it past point but cant beat Marshall
shorter this time, he cuts to point for one
good length delivery outside off stump, he comes half-forward and defends
seam-up, fullish delivery outside off stump, Jayawardene gets on top of it and defends
shot to level the scores! A rank half-volley outside off stump, Jayawardene's eyes light up, and he firmly cover drives that for four, Sri Lanka close to victory
flat outside off stump, Atapattu goes back and pushes to cover
dropped! Vettori tosses it up, Atapattu comes down and slams it to the substitute at mid-on, who dives forward, gets it, and lets it out
flattish delivery on the stumps, Atapattu shuffles across and defends it solidly
short of length delivery outside off, Atapattu comes on the frontfoot and defends it solidly
flighted delivery on the leg, Atapattu comes on the frontfoot and turns it to short mid-wicket
all over! Tossed up, he gives him the charge, gets under it but still clears both mid-off and mid-on as the ball lands safely in no man's land, and Sri Lanka have romped home
